author: Anders Fogh Rasmussen
title: Trump Takes the Lead Against Russia
text:
Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov recently warned that his country’s relations with the West are worse today than during the Cold War. Yet he failed to acknowledge that Russia’s actions are to blame. In recent months the U.S. and close European allies have shown their willingness to oppose Russian aggression. But as Moscow escalates its strategy of global disruption, more European nations must join the U.S. in increasing pressure on Vladimir Putin and his cronies.
From the incursion in Ukraine to the poisoning of former...
